issue_name: Russian FSB Cyber Actor Star Blizzard Continues Worldwide Spear-phishing Campaigns

1.description: Use a separate password for email accounts and avoid password re-use across multiple services.

2.description: Use multi-factor authentication (2-factor authentication/two-step authentication) to reduce the impact of password compromises.

3.command: Keep devices and networks up to date
3.description: Use the latest supported versions, apply security updates promptly, use anti-virus and scan regularly to guard against known malware threats.

4.description: Be cautious of spear-phishing emails. Verify the legitimacy of emails via another means if suspicious.

5.description: Turn on automated email scanning features provided by email providers.

6.description: Disable mail-forwarding or monitor settings regularly to ensure that a forwarding rule has not been set up by an external malicious actor.
